snippet: A judge rejected the defense’s arguments that George Zimmerman, who is charged with the murder of Trayvon Martin, should be allowed to move away from his home county for his safety.
abstract: Judge Debra S Nelson rejects request to lift travel restrictions on George Zimmerman, who is on trial in Florida for murder of Trayvon Martin.
lead_paragraph: A judge rejected the defense’s arguments that George Zimmerman, who is charged with the murder of Trayvon Martin, should be allowed to move away from his home county for his safety.

headline.seo: Defendant in Trayvon Martin Case Still Restricted
headline.main: Judge Keeps Curbs on Travel for Defendant in Martin Case
headline.print_headline: Judge Keeps Curbs on Travel for Defendant in Martin Case
